name: QuestionnaireResponse
title: QuestionnaireResponse
description: A structured set of questions and their answers. The questions are ordered and grouped into coherent subsets, corresponding to the structure of the grouping of the questionnaire being responded to.

elements.name: QuestionnaireResponse
elements.description: A structured set of questions and their answers.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: A business identifier assigned to a particular completed (or partially completed) questionnaire.

elements.name: basedOn
elements.description: The order, proposal or plan that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this QuestionnaireResponse.

elements.name: partOf
elements.description: A procedure or observation that this questionnaire was performed as part of the execution of.

elements.name: questionnaire
elements.description: The Questionnaire that defines and organizes the questions for which answers are being provided.

elements.name: status
elements.description: The position of the questionnaire response within its overall lifecycle.

elements.name: subject
elements.description: The subject of the questionnaire response.

elements.name: encounter
elements.description: The Encounter during which this questionnaire response was created or to which the creation of this record is tightly associated.

elements.name: authored
elements.description: The date and/or time that this set of answers were last changed.

elements.name: author
elements.description: Person who received the answers to the questions in the QuestionnaireResponse and recorded them in the system.

elements.name: source
elements.description: The person who answered the questions about the subject.

elements.name: item
elements.description: A group or question item from the original questionnaire for which answers are provided.
